CustomField.description: This is the email address of the user that the call was connected to (as configured in the Natterbox portal)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If the recipient is a Natterbox User, this will be their email address as it appears in the Natterbox Portal. If this is an external call, this field will be left blank. NOTE: This address is NOT pulled from Salesforce but from the Natterbox system.
CustomField.label: ConnectedEmailAddress
